name: Haunted Pizza Delivery
description:
A game about delivering a pizza to Dracula, while avoiding all the other undead that come your way!

Made for Ludum dare 48, 48.

you see it fits the theme because you're going deeper and deeper into the castle.
what's with the pizza delivery thing then? I uh. thought it was funny. Definitely wasn't hoping for another theme to win. Totally.
